info.name: Rainbow Roots API v1
info.description:
# Rainbow Roots API v1 (Sanctum)

**Base URL**: `{{base_url}}` (default `http://localhost:8000/api/v1`)

**Auth**: Bearer `{{token}}` (login/register to obtain; stored in env after Login request test)

**Content-Type**: `application/json`

**Versioning**: Path-based `/api/v1`

## Schemas
- **User**: `id`, `name`, `first_name`, `last_name`, `preferred_name`, `email`, `role` (`admin|teacher|parent`), `preferred_locale`, `timezone`, `is_active`, `last_login_at`.
- **GuardianProfile**: `household_id`, `primary_phone`, `secondary_phone`, address fields, `preferred_contact_times`, `communication_preferences[]`, `identity_verified_at`.
- **Student**: `id`, `first_name`, `last_name`, `preferred_name`, `date_of_birth`, `grade`, `status` (`onboarding|active|archived`), `diagnoses[]`, `notes`, `assessment_summary`, `ieps_or_goals[]`, `risk_flags[]`, `teacher_id`, `case_manager_id`, `current_learning_path_id`, `start_date`, `guardians[pivot: relationship, is_primary, access_level, notifications_opt_in]`.
- **Module**: `id`, `uuid`, `code`, `title`, `summary`, `subject`, `grade_band`, `status` (`draft|published|archived`), `version_label`, `difficulty`, `estimated_duration`, `learning_type`, `objectives[]`, `prerequisites[]`, `progress_tracking`, `completion_criteria`, `feedback_strategy`, `access_control`, `published_at`, `archived_at`, `tags[]`, `authors[]`, `lessons[]` (materials, media_uploads).
- **Path**: `id`, `uuid`, `code`, `title`, `summary`, `subject`, `grade_band`, `status`, `visibility` (`private|school|district`), `pacing`, `modules_count`, `objectives[]`, `success_metrics[]`, `planned_release_date`, `published_at`, `archived_at`, `owner_user_id`, `modules[sequence_order]`.
- **StudySession**: `id`, `teacher_id`, `title`, `description`, `starts_at`, `ends_at`, `location`, `meeting_url`, `capacity`, `timezone`, `recurrence_rule`, `status` (`scheduled|cancelled`), `occurrences[]`, `enrollments[]`.
- **Occurrence**: `study_session_id`, `starts_at`, `ends_at`, `status`.
- **Enrollment**: `study_session_id`, `student_id`, `status` (`enrolled|waitlisted`), `waitlist_position`.

## Success & Error Patterns
- **Success**: 200 OK (reads/updates), 201 Created (creates/enrollments), 204 No Content (deletes/logout).
- **Validation**: 422 with `{ "message": "The given data was invalid.", "errors": { "field": ["reason"] } }`.
- **Auth**: 401 missing/invalid token; **Forbidden**: 403 ownership/role block.
- **Not Found**: 404; **Bad Request**: 400 (e.g., mismatched session/enrollment).

item.name: 00 - Setup & Auth
item.description: Register/login to obtain bearer token. Login test stores token as `token` env var.

request.description:
Success: 201 with user + token. Errors: 422 validation, 409/422 duplicate email.
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/register" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"name":"Alex Teacher","email":"teacher@example.com","password":"secret123","password_confirmation":"secret123"}'

exec: pm.test('Token missing', function () { pm.expect.fail('No token in response'); });

request.description:
Success: 200 with user + token. Errors: 422 invalid credentials or inactive account; 401 if bearer missing for protected routes.
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/login" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"identifier":"teacher@example.com","password":"secret123"}'

Success: 204; revokes current token. Errors: 401 if unauthenticated.
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/logout" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

Success: 200 message. Errors: 422 for invalid email.
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/password/forgot" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"email":"user@example.com"}'

response.name: 200 OK
response.body: { "message": "We have emailed your password reset link." }

request.description:
Success: 200 message. Errors: 422 invalid token/email or validation.
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/password/reset" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"token":"<reset-token>","email":"user@example.com","password":"newSecret123","password_confirmation":"newSecret123"}'

Success: 200 paginated list with filters/meta. Errors: 401 unauthenticated.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/students?per_page=10&grade=5&status=active&search=alex" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

Success: 200 student with guardians. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 403 if not teacher/case manager; 404 if missing.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/students/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

response.name: 200 OK
response.body:
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "first_name": "Alex",
    "last_name": "Rivera",
    "preferred_name": null,
    "date_of_birth": "2012-03-05",
    "grade": "5",
    "status": "active",
    "diagnoses": [],
    "notes": null,
    "assessment_summary": null,
    "ieps_or_goals": [],
    "risk_flags": [],
    "teacher_id": 2,
    "case_manager_id": 2,
    "current_learning_path_id": null,
    "start_date": "2025-02-01",
    "created_at": "2025-02-10 10:00:00",
    "updated_at": "2025-02-10 10:00:00",
    "guardians": [
      {
        "id": 5,
        "name": "Jamie Rivera",
        "email": "jamie@example.com",
        "pivot": {"relationship": "mother", "is_primary": true, "access_level": "view", "notifications_opt_in": true},
        "profile": {"primary_phone": "+15555550123", "address_line1": "123 Main St"}
      }
    ]
  }
}

request.description:

Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/students" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"first_name":"Sam","last_name":"Rivera","date_of_birth":"2012-03-05","grade":"5","case_manager_id":2}'

request.description:
Success: 200 student resource. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 403 if not owner teacher/case manager; 422 validation; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X PATCH "{{base_url}}/students/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"status":"active"}'

Success: 200 list of guardians with linked students. Errors: 401 unauthenticated.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/parents" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

request.description:
Success: 201 parent resource with pivoted students. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 422 validation.
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/parents" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"first_name":"Jamie","last_name":"Rivera","email":"jamie@example.com","primary_phone":"+15555550123"}'

Success: 200 paginated modules + filters/meta. Errors: 401 unauthenticated.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/modules?per_page=10" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

Success: 200 module with tags/authors/lessons. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/modules/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

request.description:
Success: 200 module resource. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 422 validation; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X PATCH "{{base_url}}/modules/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"status":"published"}'

Success: 204. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X DELETE "{{base_url}}/modules/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

Success: 200 paginated paths + filters/meta. Errors: 401 unauthenticated.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/paths?per_page=10" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

Success: 200 path with owner/modules. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/paths/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

response.name: 200 OK
response.body:
{
  "data": {

    "code": "PATH-MATH-01",
    "title": "Math Foundations",
    "summary": "Intro modules",

    "objectives": ["Build basics"],
    "success_metrics": ["Quiz >= 80%"],
    "planned_release_date": null,

  }
}

request.description:
Success: 201 path resource. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 422 validation.
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/paths" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"code":"PATH-MATH-01","title":"Math Foundations"}'

Success: 200 path resource. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 422 validation; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X PATCH "{{base_url}}/paths/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"status":"published"}'

Success: 204. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X DELETE "{{base_url}}/paths/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

Success: 200 array of teacher-owned sessions with counts and occurrences. Errors: 401 unauthenticated.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/study-sessions" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

Success: 200 session with occurrences. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 403 if not owner teacher; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X GET "{{base_url}}/study-sessions/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"

Success: 201 session with occurrences; status=scheduled. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 403 if not teacher/admin; 422 validation (time conflicts, capacity, recurrence).
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/study-sessions" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"title":"Reading Lab","starts_at":"2025-03-10T15:00:00Z","ends_at":"2025-03-10T16:00:00Z","capacity":6}'

Success: 200 session with regenerated occurrences. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 403 if not owner teacher/admin; 422 validation (conflicts, timing); 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X PATCH "{{base_url}}/study-sessions/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"capacity":8}'

Success: 200 occurrence resource. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 403 if not owner teacher/admin; 422 validation (timing); 404 not found or mismatch.
Curl: curl -X PATCH "{{base_url}}/study-sessions/1/occurrences/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"status":"scheduled"}'

Success: 201 enrollment (waitlist_position when waitlisted). Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 403 if not owner teacher or student not in caseload; 422 validation (duplicate enrollment); 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X POST "{{base_url}}/study-sessions/1/enrollments" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"student_id":1}'

Success: 204; waitlist auto-promotes. Errors: 401 unauthenticated; 403 if not owner teacher; 400 if enrollment not in session; 404 not found.
Curl: curl -X DELETE "{{base_url}}/study-sessions/1/enrollments/1" -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token}}"
